title: I’m very proud of the gold medal award I received from the Environmental Protection Agency in recognition of the air modeling work I did supporting the issuance of the Vineyard Wind air permit. This… | Leiran Biton
description: I’m very proud of the gold medal award I received from the Environmental Protection Agency in recognition of the air modeling work I did supporting the issuance of the Vineyard Wind air permit. This represented years of effort to apply stringent requirements on a fledgling industry in a unique environmental setting. Government work is rarely glamorous, but this work in partnership with dozens of others across the federal government was important in setting the highest environmental standards for the next generation of energy projects in our country. With the power from this and other similar projects, the US is poised to take advantage of one of the most renewable and reliable resources on our shores: wind power.
